column2: Change the file name to the name of the circuit file. The file has to be .csv file so do not use another extension.
This is the time in seconds.
Recommened to be less than 10 microseconds for accuracy.
This is the time step with data is stored and has to be equal to or greater than the simulation time step.

column1: Name of the data storage file
column2: This is where all meter data and control signals will be stored.
Add or remove as many control files as needed in separate columns.
Say yes if you think the data file is too large and plotting is taking too much time or else say no.
There should be at least two intervals for storage.
